title: Reached top 400. Would you watch me smurf on Twitch?
body:
Reached top 400 early this season (Around Diamond 2).

Would you be interested in watching me smurf in Silver? (Have an old account with lots champs)

The reason is, I've seen unranked to Diamond streams, but never from the OCE region. Let me know if you guys are interested.

I would try fun builds and keep the commentary educational, while still entertaining.

I've seen a few posts mentioning they are trying to improve, and this may help those who need it.

Can also duo with viewers.

replies.body: Sounds interesting enough, people will probably ask you to carry them XD
Ok, thanks for the reply. Yea, I'll def be willing to duo with viewers and I may just be the one getting carried if I test different builds :P
